Name: Industrial production
Description: Volume index in production. Mining and quarrying; manufacturing; electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply

Name: Consumer prices
Description: Harmonised index of consumer prices, Overall index excluding energy and unprocessed food

Name: Loan volumes
Description: Outstanding amounts of adjusted loans to non-financial corporations in the euro area by monetary and financial institutions (MFI) excluding the ESCB

Name: Foreign government debt in banks’ balance sheets
Description: Outstanding amounts of general government debt securities of other Euro area member states (all countries except the reference area) held by MFIs in the reference area

Name: Domestic sovereign debt in banks’ balance sheets
Description: Outstanding amounts of general government debt securities of the domestic country (the reference area) held by MFIs in the reference area

Name: Cost of borrowing for corporations
Description: Annualised agreed rate on new loans to non-financial corporations, calculated by weighting the volumes with a moving average

Name: Government bond yield
Description: Secondary market yields of government bonds with maturities of close to 10 years, monthly average

Name: Swap rate
Description: Zero-coupon euro swap curve with maturity of 10 years, end of period

Name: Shadow Short Rate
Description: Estimate for the euro area shadow short rate , month end
